parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.48</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Arrays </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Intersects array1 with array2 returning array of unique common elements. Additionally, using the same array for array1 and array2 will simply return array of unique elements. Intersects only 1st dimension of an array. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> array1 '''arrayIntersect''' array2</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> array1: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> array2: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_arr1 = [1,2,3,4,5,2,3,4];
_arr2 = [4,5,6,1,2,3,5,6];
[[hint]] [[str]] (_arr1 [[arrayIntersect]] _arr2); // [4,5,1,2,3]</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_arr = [1,2,3,1,2,3,1,2,3,4,5];
[[hint]] [[str]] (_arr [[arrayIntersect]] _arr); // [1,2,3,4,5]</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> Remove [[nil]]s:<code> [[hint]] [[str]] ([1,2,[[nil]],3] [[arrayIntersect]] [1,2,[[nil]],3]); // [1,2,3]</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x4</name>=<value> Also works with array elements which are [[isEqualTo|equal]]:<code> [[hint]] [[str]] ([[1],[2],[3]] [[arrayIntersect]] [[2],[3],[4]]); // [[2],[3]]</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE4</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x5</name>=<value> This command is case sensitive:<code>["cAse"] [[arrayIntersect]] ["cAse"];<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>["cAse"]</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>true</value></part></template>
["cAse"] [[arrayIntersect]] ["casE"];<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>[]</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>true</value></part></template></code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE5</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[append]], [[set]], [[pushBack]], [[pushBackUnique]], [[apply]], [[select]], [[resize]], [[reverse]], [[count]], [[find]], [[in]], [[forEach]], [[deleteAt]], [[deleteRange]], [[sort]], [[param]], [[params]], [[toArray]], [[toString]], [[splitString]], [[joinString]], [[BIS_fnc_arrayPushStack]], [[BIS_fnc_arrayPush]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
[[Category:Arma 3: New Scripting Commands List|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
[[Category:Scripting_Commands_Arma_3]]</root>
